# Cross-Domain Impact Review

## Current Domain Usage
Describe where the AI system is currently used.

---

## Proposed Cross-Domain Influence
Explain how the system would influence decisions in other domains.

---

## Risk Amplification Analysis
Evaluate how risk increases with cross-domain influence.

---

## Accountability Implications
Explain how accountability changes when decisions span teams.

---

## Cross-Domain Decision
State clearly whether cross-domain influence is permitted or denied.
